headline: Federal Realty to Present at Citi's 2026 Global Property CEO Conference
summary: Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE: FRT) announced today that the Company's management team is scheduled to participate in the Citi 2026 Global Property CEO Conference on Tuesday, March 3, 2026 from 10:15 AM ET to 10:50 AM ET.

headline: Tanger to Present at Citi’s 31st Annual Global Property CEO Conference
summary: GREENSBORO, N.C., February 25, 2026--Tanger® (NYSE: SKT), a leading owner and operator of outlet and open-air retail shopping destinations, announced today that it will participate in Citi’s 2026 Global Property CEO Conference from March 2 through March 4, 2026. Stephen Yalof, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Michael Bilerman, Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Chief Investment Officer, will participate in a round table presentation scheduled for 11:00 a.m. Eastern T

headline: Copper prices set to touch $14,000 as China restocking meets bullish investor positioning
summary: Citi leans bullish despite acknowledging price direction remains uncertain, citing multiple tailwinds converging in coming months. headline: Option traders moderately bearish in Citi with shares down 1.7%
summary: Option traders moderately bearish in Citi (C), with shares down $1.89 near $108.86. Options volume roughly in line with average with 19k contracts traded and puts leading calls for a put/call ratio of 1.13, compared to a typical level near 1.05. Implied volatility (IV30) is higher by 0.2 points near 37.58, in the highest 10% of observations over the past year, suggesting an expected daily move of $2.58. Put-call skew flattened, suggesting a modestly bullish tone.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnl

headline: Why The Diversified Energy (LSE:DEC) Story Is Shifting As Caution Tempers Valuation Hopes
summary: The latest update for Diversified Energy resets the price target while the fair value estimate edges from £14.79 to £14.91. Analysts are using this adjustment to align their targets with more cautious sentiment, trying to weigh valuation support against execution risks flagged in recent research. As you read on, you will see how this evolving narrative might shape the way you track the stock from here. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story. headline: How The Melrose Industries (LSE:MRO) Narrative Is Evolving With New Targets And Assumptions
summary: The latest update on Melrose Industries centres on a refreshed Street price target, which now sits at £7.63 compared with the previous £7.35. Analysts link this move to updated fair value work at £7.08 per share and are using the new target to reassess what they see as a reasonable trading range, while highlighting areas where execution and valuation still need to be tested. As you read on, you will see how this evolving narrative might shape how you track the stock from here. Analyst Price...
